name: Astrolabe
description: Knowledge navigation instrument - brass sextant, star charts, celestial precision

character.short: Brass sextant against night sky. The navigator's study at 3am.
character.extended: NAVIGATION + INSTRUMENT: Warm precision. Candle glow on brass instruments. The operator interface to vast semantic territory. Where documents become coordinates and reading becomes wayfinding.
character.mood: Contemplative focus. Late-night scholarship. The satisfaction of finding position in unmapped space.

expression.NAVIGATION: Documents positioned by semantic content. Cardinal Fields as navigable dimensions. YOU ARE HERE indicators.
expression.INSTRUMENT: The platform itself is the instrument. InstrumentPanel, Navigation Grid, coordinate displays.
expression.LIVING_GEOMETRY: Gold particles flowing along Vector I axes. Documents as living points in space.
expression.GRADIENT: Cardinal Field percentages. Similarity scores. Continuous positioning.

resonatesWith.translationNotes: References should feel warm and precise. Avoid cold/clinical. The operator is a scholar, not a technician.

particles.behavior: Flow along Vector I axes - diagonal bands of motion radiating from center
particles.meaning: Documents/concepts as navigable points. Motion suggests exploration along meaning dimensions. Particles ARE the semantic content made visible.

usage.PT Mono: Coordinates, labels, navigation elements, section headers

NavigationGrid.meaning: Frame transforms content into 'reading' on instrument. User becomes operator.

InstrumentPanel.meaning: Control surface. Status readouts. Aerospace-inspired tool palette.

SemanticResonance.meaning: Cross-document connections emerging from noise of the collection.

motion.character: Deliberate, instrument-like. Snappy initiation, gentle settle.
motion.transitions: Fade and slide, never bounce or spring

glitch.note: Use sparingly. Astrolabe is precise, not corrupted.
